verses.verse: And they came <S%G2064><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side <S%G4008><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> into the country <S%G5561><s%> of the Gerasenes. <S%G1086><s%>

And when He had come <S%G1831><s%> out of the boat, <S%G4143><s%> immediately <S%G2117><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> from the tombs <S%G3419><s%> with an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> met <S%G5221><s%> Him,

and he had <S%G2192><s%> his dwelling <S%G2731><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the tombs. <S%G3418><s%> And no <S%G3761><s%> <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> was able <S%G1410><s%> to bind <S%G1210><s%> him anymore, <S%G3765><s%> even <S%G3761><s%> with a chain; <S%G254><s%>

because <S%G1223><s%> he had often <S%G4178><s%> been bound <S%G1210><s%> with shackles <S%G3976><s%> and chains, <S%G254><s%> and the chains <S%G254><s%> had been torn <S%G1288><s%> apart <S%G1288><s%> by him, and the shackles <S%G3976><s%> broken <S%G4937><s%> in pieces, <S%G4937><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> was strong <S%G2480><s%> enough <S%G2480><s%> to subdue <S%G1150><s%> him.

And constantly <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3956><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and day, <S%G2250><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the tombs <S%G3418><s%> and in the mountains, <S%G3735><s%> he was crying <S%G2896><s%> out and gashing <S%G2629><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> with stones. <S%G3037><s%>
And seeing <S%G3708><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> from a distance, <S%G3113><s%> he ran <S%G5143><s%> up and bowed <S%G4352><s%> down <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G4352><s%> Him;

and crying <S%G2896><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> do I have to do with You, Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of the Most <S%G5310><s%> High <S%G5310><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>? I implore <S%G3726><s%> You by God, <S%G2316><s%> do not torment <S%G928><s%> me!"
For He had been saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Come <S%G1831><s%> out of the man, <S%G444><s%> you unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit! <S%G4151><s%>"
And He was asking <S%G1905><s%> him, "What <S%G5101><s%> is your name <S%G3686><s%>?" And he said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "My name <S%G3686><s%> is Legion; <S%G3003><s%> for we are many. <S%G4183><s%>"
And he [began] to entreat <S%G3870><s%> Him earnestly <S%G4183><s%> not to send <S%G649><s%> them out of the country. <S%G5561><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> there was a big <S%G3173><s%> herd <S%G34><s%> of swine <S%G5519><s%> feeding <S%G1006><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> on the mountain. <S%G3735><s%>
And [the demons] entreated <S%G3870><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Send <S%G3992><s%> us into the swine <S%G5519><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that we may enter <S%G1525><s%> them."

And He gave <S%G2010><s%> them permission. <S%G2010><s%> And coming <S%G1831><s%> out, the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> the swine; <S%G5519><s%> and the herd <S%G34><s%> rushed <S%G3729><s%> down <S%G2596><s%> the steep <S%G2911><s%> bank <S%G2911><s%> into the sea, <S%G2281><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> two <S%G1367><s%> thousand <S%G1367><s%> [of them]; and they were drowned <S%G4155><s%> in the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And their herdsmen <S%G1006><s%> ran <S%G5343><s%> away <S%G5343><s%> and reported <S%G518><s%> it in the city <S%G4172><s%> and [out] in the country. <S%G68><s%> And [the people] came <S%G2064><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> it was that had happened. <S%G1096><s%>

And they came <S%G2064><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and observed <S%G2334><s%> the man who had been demon-possessed sitting <S%G2521><s%> down, <S%G2521><s%> clothed <S%G2439><s%> and in his right <S%G4993><s%> mind, <S%G4993><s%> the very man who had had <S%G2192><s%> the "legion <S%G3003><s%>"; and they became frightened. <S%G5399><s%>

And those <S%G3588><s%> who had seen <S%G3708><s%> it described <S%G1334><s%> to them how <S%G4459><s%> it had happened <S%G1096><s%> to the demon-possessed man, and [all] about <S%G4012><s%> the swine. <S%G5519><s%>
And they began <S%G757><s%> to entreat <S%G3870><s%> Him to depart <S%G565><s%> from their region. <S%G3725><s%>
And as He was getting <S%G1684><s%> into the boat, <S%G4143><s%> the man who had been demon-possessed was entreating <S%G3870><s%> Him that he might accompany <S%G3326><s%> <S%G1510><s%> Him.

And He did not let <S%G863><s%> him, but He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Go <S%G5217><s%> home <S%G3624><s%> to your people <S%G4674><s%> and report <S%G518><s%> to them what <S%G3745><s%> great <S%G3745><s%> things <S%G3745><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> has done <S%G4160><s%> for you, and [how] He had <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on you."

And he went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> and began <S%G757><s%> to proclaim <S%G2784><s%> in Decapolis <S%G1179><s%> what <S%G3745><s%> great <S%G3745><s%> things <S%G3745><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had done <S%G4160><s%> for him; and everyone <S%G3956><s%> marveled. <S%G2296><s%>

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had crossed <S%G1276><s%> over <S%G1276><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> in the boat <S%G4143><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side, <S%G4008><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> gathered <S%G4863><s%> about <S%G1909><s%> Him; and He stayed <S%G1510><s%> by the seashore. <S%G2281><s%>

And one <S%G1520><s%> of the synagogue <S%G752><s%> officials <S%G752><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Jairus <S%G2383><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> up, and upon seeing <S%G3708><s%> Him, fell <S%G4098><s%> at His feet, <S%G4228><s%>

and entreated <S%G3870><s%> Him earnestly, <S%G4183><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "My little <S%G2365><s%> daughter <S%G2365><s%> is at the point <S%G2079><s%> of death; <S%G2079><s%> [please] come <S%G2064><s%> and lay <S%G2007><s%> Your hands <S%G5495><s%> on her, that she may get <S%G4982><s%> well <S%G4982><s%> and live. <S%G2198><s%>"
And He went <S%G565><s%> off <S%G565><s%> with him; and a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> was following <S%G190><s%> Him and pressing <S%G4918><s%> in on Him.
And a woman <S%G1135><s%> who had had <S%G1510><s%> a hemorrhage <S%G4511><s%> <S%G129><s%> for twelve <S%G1427><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%>

and had endured <S%G3958><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> at the hands <S%G5259><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> physicians, <S%G2395><s%> and had spent <S%G1159><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that she had <S%G3844><s%> and was not helped <S%G5623><s%> at all, <S%G3367><s%> but rather <S%G3123><s%> had grown <S%G2064><s%> worse, <S%G5501><s%>
after hearing <S%G191><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> up in the crowd <S%G3793><s%> behind <S%G3693><s%> [Him,] and touched <S%G681><s%> His cloak. <S%G2440><s%>
For she thought, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> I just <S%G2579><s%> touch <S%G681><s%> His garments, <S%G2440><s%> I shall get <S%G4982><s%> well."

And immediately <S%G2117><s%> the flow <S%G4077><s%> of her blood <S%G129><s%> was dried <S%G3583><s%> up; and she felt <S%G1097><s%> in her body <S%G4983><s%> that she was healed <S%G2390><s%> of her affliction. <S%G3148><s%>

And immediately <S%G2117><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> perceiving <S%G1921><s%> in Himself <S%G1438><s%> that the power <S%G1411><s%> [proceeding] from Him had gone <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> turned <S%G1994><s%> around <S%G1994><s%> in the crowd <S%G3793><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> touched <S%G681><s%> My garments <S%G2440><s%>?"

And His disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "You see <S%G991><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> pressing <S%G4918><s%> in on You, and You say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Who <S%G5101><s%> touched <S%G681><s%> Me?'"
And He looked <S%G4017><s%> around <S%G4017><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> the woman who had done <S%G4160><s%> this. <S%G3778><s%>

But the woman <S%G1135><s%> fearing <S%G5399><s%> and trembling, <S%G5141><s%> aware <S%G3609><s%> of what <S%G3739><s%> had happened <S%G1096><s%> to her, came <S%G2064><s%> and fell <S%G4363><s%> down <S%G4363><s%> before <S%G4363><s%> Him, and told <S%G3004><s%> Him the whole <S%G3956><s%> truth. <S%G225><s%>

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Daughter, <S%G2364><s%> your faith <S%G4102><s%> has made <S%G4982><s%> you well; <S%G4982><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> in peace, <S%G1515><s%> and be healed <S%G5199><s%> of your affliction. <S%G3148><s%>"

While He was still <S%G2089><s%> speaking, <S%G2980><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> from the [house of] the synagogue <S%G752><s%> official, <S%G752><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Your daughter <S%G2364><s%> has died; <S%G599><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> trouble <S%G4660><s%> the Teacher <S%G1320><s%> anymore <S%G2089><s%>?"

But Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> overhearing <S%G3878><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> was being spoken, <S%G2980><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the synagogue <S%G752><s%> official, <S%G752><s%> "Do not be afraid <S%G5399><s%> [any longer,] only <S%G3440><s%> believe. <S%G4100><s%>"

And He allowed <S%G863><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> to follow <S%G4870><s%> with Him, except <S%G1508><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and James <S%G2385><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> of James. <S%G2385><s%>

And they came <S%G2064><s%> to the house <S%G3624><s%> of the synagogue <S%G752><s%> official; <S%G752><s%> and He beheld <S%G2334><s%> a commotion, <S%G2351><s%> and [people] loudly <S%G4183><s%> weeping <S%G2799><s%> and wailing. <S%G214><s%>

And entering <S%G1525><s%> in, He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Why <S%G5101><s%> make <S%G2350><s%> a commotion <S%G2350><s%> and weep <S%G2799><s%>? The child <S%G3813><s%> has not died, <S%G599><s%> but is asleep. <S%G2518><s%>"

And they [began] laughing <S%G2606><s%> at Him. But putting <S%G1544><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%> out, He took <S%G3880><s%> along <S%G3880><s%> the child <S%G3813><s%>'s father <S%G3962><s%> and mother <S%G3384><s%> and His own companions, <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3326><s%> and entered <S%G1531><s%> [the room] where <S%G3699><s%> the child was.

And taking <S%G2902><s%> the child <S%G3813><s%> by the hand, <S%G5495><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Talitha <S%G5008><s%> kum! <S%G2891><s%>" (which <S%G3739><s%> translated <S%G3177><s%> means, <S%G1510><s%> "Little <S%G2877><s%> girl, <S%G2877><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, arise! <S%G1453><s%>" ).

And immediately <S%G2117><s%> the girl <S%G2877><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> and [began] to walk; <S%G4043><s%> for she was twelve <S%G1427><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> old. And immediately <S%G2117><s%> they were completely <S%G1611><s%> <S%G3173><s%> astounded. <S%G1839><s%>

And He gave <S%G1291><s%> them strict <S%G4183><s%> orders <S%G1291><s%> that no <S%G3367><s%> one <S%G3367><s%> should know <S%G1097><s%> about this; <S%G3778><s%> and He said <S%G3004><s%> that [something] should be given <S%G1325><s%> her to eat. <S%G2068><s%>
